thread.title: Watch Drake Send Rihanna Some Birthday Love During His Dublin Concert | Z100
thread.title_full: Watch Drake Send Rihanna Some Birthday Love During His Dublin Concert | Z100

title: Watch Drake Send Rihanna Some Birthday Love During His Dublin Concert | Z100
text:
Watch Drake Send Rihanna Some Birthday Love During His Dublin Concert Just now 
Drake has nothing but love for his former flame Rihanna , as seen during his Monday night (February 20) stop of his "Boy Meets World Tour" in Dublin. { "position1" : { "type" : "artist", "id" : 44512, "name" : "Drake" } } 
Even though the former couple split a few months back, Drizzy took some time out of his show to send some birthday love over to the 29-year-old starlet. "It's somebody's birthday todayâ€”somebody I have a lot of love for and a lot of respect for," the Canadian rapper told the packed crowd. "So, instead of singing 'Happy Birthday,' though, we just going to do this in Dublin. Instead of singing 'Happy Birthday,' we're going to set it off just like this..." 
Instead of the traditional birthday tune, the Young Money MC waited a moment for "Work," his 2016 mega-collaboration with the Barbadian titan, to play for the crowd. "You better sing this s**t for RiRi's birthday right now," he shouted. 
Drake isn't one to be shy about his feelings towards the Bad Gal. Back in August, he shared his love for the pop star when presenting her with the Michael Jackson Vanguard Award at the 2016 VMAs. "She's someone I've been in love with since I was 22 years old," he said at the time. "She's one of my best friends in the world. All my adult life, I've looked up to her, even though she's younger than me. She's a living breathing legend in our industry." Drake Wishes Rihanna A Happy Birthday... pic.twitter.com/bypdxxBT7o
